des: "The mellow flavor of a special tequila needs only a few additions, like fresh lime juice, triple sec, and a lemon wedge, to make the perfect summer refresher."
ins: Pour Sauza (R) Conmemorativo into a pitcher with ice. Add in 4 oz. DeKuyper(R) Triple Sec and 12 oz. fresh lime juice. Finally add 12 oz. simple syrup, stir and serve over ice.
